about_the_game:
Rising from the hot desert sands, the Egyptian Mythology returns to the world stage once more! Master the ancient secrets of the afterlife and use the graveyard to raise hordes of restless mummies! Learn from renowned architects and turn your Temples into awe-inspiring monuments, complete with special abilities! The people of Egypt turn to their Gods once again and look for divine guidance. Will you be their divine messenger, their Pharaoh, in this pivotal moment or would you turn your back and ride deep into the desert secrets?





Includes

  • x60 Egyptian Card Packs
  • Apep Mythical Card (effect to be revealed in the incoming weeks)
  • Exclusive "Warden of Duat" Title
  • Exclusive "Medjay" Title
  • Exclusive Egyptian Card Back
  • Exclusive Egyptian Fresh Recruit Skin
  • Exclusive for Limited Time Horus Mini Skin
  • Exclusive Egyptian Main Temple Skin
  • Exclusive Egyptian Side Temple Skin
  • Exclusive Egyptian Trophy



Each Egyptian Card Pack contains Egyptian and Neutral cards only!

Egyptian Mythology will launch in January

If you already have purchased an Egyptian Mythology pre-order offer, you will receive only the Card Packs from this one!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM

short_description: Prepare yourself for the Egyptian Mythology expansion with this stunning offer full exclusive items and valuable Card Packs!
